# Issue 3034: [with patches; needs review] improved cleaning code for Debian packages

archive/issues_003034.json:
```json
{
    "body": "Assignee: tabbott\n\nSome of the \"upstream\" tarballs automatically generated by sage-debsource aren't entirely clean; I've added code to run debuild clean before generating the upstream tarball.  \n\nAlso, cddlib's clean target should use distclean.\n\nIssue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/3034\n\n",
    "created_at": "2008-04-26T22:23:24Z",
```

Assignee: tabbott

Some of the "upstream" tarballs automatically generated by sage-debsource aren't entirely clean; I've added code to run debuild clean before generating the upstream tarball.  

Also, cddlib's clean target should use distclean.

Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/3034
